ValidationRule.description: If Reassign-Category 1 = Billing - 401k and Reassign-Category 2 = Billing Changes, then Reassign-Category 3 needs to be filled in before saving the case.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(RecordTypeId="012700000001U2z", ISPICKVAL( Reassign_Category_1__c,"Billing - 401k"), ISPICKVAL( Reassign_Category_2__c ,"Billing Changes"), ISPICKVAL( Reassign_Category_3__c ,""))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter value for Reassign Category 3
